title: How to Bake Peanut Butter and Honey Cookies

steps.headline: Grease or line baking sheets with parchment paper.
Pour a small amount of granulated sugar into a small bowl.
steps.description: You will dip the fork into the sugar when shaping the cookies.

steps.headline: Add all the ingredients to a mixing bowl.
Roll the cookies into walnut sized balls.
Press a criss-cross pattern using a fork dipped in granulated sugar.
Place cookies on baking sheets.
steps.description: Be sure to leave enough room for the cookies to spread.

steps.headline: Bake 5 to 8 minutes or until golden brown.
Remove cookies from baking sheets after allowing them to cool for a few minutes.
Cool cookies on wire baking racks.

text: Preheat oven to 350 °F (177 °C).  Grease or line baking sheets with parchment paper.  Pour a small amount of granulated sugar into a small bowl. You will dip the fork into the sugar when shaping the cookies. Add all the ingredients to a mixing bowl.  Mix to combine.  Roll the cookies into walnut sized balls.  Press a criss-cross pattern using a fork dipped in granulated sugar. This helps prevent sticking. Place cookies on baking sheets. Be sure to leave enough room for the cookies to spread. Bake 5 to 8 minutes or until golden brown.  Remove cookies from baking sheets after allowing them to cool for a few minutes.  Cool cookies on wire baking racks.
